item.description: Casual outing here... Leashed walk down the newly-extended Milford Rail Trail with the dogs. Bring the treats for some sporadic training from moving attention to loose-leash walking. The NEBBC folks are always up for an improptu trick session! (We seem to encorporate it into everything! :)... I need the exercise and so does Spark; I'd love to make this a regular thing if we have enough interest!
item.how_to_find_us: NEBBC shirts and pitties, pitties everywhere!
item.name: Walk 'n Train at the Milford Bike Trail!
